text: Manly Palmer Hall (March 18, 1901 â€“ August 29, 1990) was a Canadian-born author, lecturer, astrologer and mystic. He wrote many books, including The Lost Keys of Freemasonry and The Secret Teachings of All Ages. Hall started the Philosophical Research Society in Los Angeles in 1934.
